name: test_e2e_with_logs[536_SSRF_DNS_005]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SSRF_DNS_005` |
| **Name** | Short IP Loopback SSRF Bypass |
| **Category** | SSRF |
| **Subcategory** | dns_rebinding |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
